Permutable - Class in Unnamed Package
The Permutable abstract class extends the BranchApp class and provides an abstract method request() that must be implemented by concrete subclasses.

PermutableBranch - Class in Unnamed Package
The PermutableBranch class is an abstract class that extends BranchApp and provides a method for requesting permutations of a branch.

The PermutableController class provides methods to execute requests on instances of the Permutable and PermutableBranch classes.

printMenu() - Method in class Menu
Prints the names of all menu items in the menu.
printOrder() - Method in class Order
Prints the current state of the order, including all items in the cart with their quantities and prices, as well as the total price and dine-in status if applicable.
ProcessOrder - Class in Unnamed Package
The ProcessOrder class extends the PermutableBranch class and provides functionality to process orders by updating their status.

Constructs a new instance of the ProcessOrder class.
PromoteStaff - Class in Unnamed Package
The PromoteStaff class extends the Permutable class and provides functionality to promote staff members to the manager role in a specific branch.
PromoteStaff() - Constructor for class PromoteStaff
Constructs a new instance of the PromoteStaff class.
promotionquotaChecker() - Method in class Branch
Checks if the quota for managers has been reached based on the current number of staff and managers, with a different set of conditions than the quotaChecker method.
